After a year of development, The Official daisyUI Figma Library is now available for designers in Figma!
This fully tokenized Figma file includes all daisyUI components, theme colors, variables and variants, with regular updates.
A game-changer for designers and developers to use the same design system in both Figma and in CSS.

Blink is a template for agencies, companies, startups, or small businesses
Available for React and Svelte Features: - Made with Tailwind CSS and daisyUI - Compatible with all daisyUI themes - Clean, responsive, easy to customize - Dark and light theme switch button Including: - Landing page - Pricing page and pricing table - Projects (portfolio) page - About page - Contact form

**Fully functional store template for Lemon Squeezy or Gumroad**

Made with daisyUI 5 and Next.js 15

Add your **LemonSqueezy API key** or **Gumroad API key** to the env file, add custom data for your products and your online store will be ready in **less than 5 minutes**!

This template receives your simple list of products coming from the LemonSqueezy API or Gumroad API, adds your custom data and attributes to the products and generates a functional online store with all the standard online store capabilities you need.

Including Homepage, collections page with filter and sort, product page with image gallery, zoom, custom attributes, variant links, related product suggestions and more.
Can I use this template without Lemon Squeezy or Gumroad?

If the Lemon Squeezy API key or Gumroad API key is not provided, the data will come from the local JSON file. So you can use the template without Lemon Squeezy or Gumroad, using a static JSON file, and for checkout and payment you can use your own solution.

  - Theme changer menu
  - 3D card effect

Yes, you pay once and you can use the product forever. No subscription, no monthly fees, no hidden costs.
You will receive an email with the download link. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.

All packages will receive bug fixes as long as they are available on the store. We will also add new versions and dependency updates if needed. You can download the latest version from the link you received in the email, or from https://app.lemonsqueezy.com/my-orders or https://www.creem.io/my-orders/login
We offer support via Discord. You can join the server https://daisyui.com/discord and ask your questions there. We will do our best to help you.

If there was an issue with the product, send an email to help@daisyui.com so I can help you. I will do my best to resolve the issue. We don't offer refunds for digital products, however if there was a mistake in payment, for example if you paid twice for the same product, send an email to help@daisyui.com and I will refund the extra payment.
Please check your spam folder. If you still can't find it, send an email to help@daisyui.com so I can help you.
Send me an email at help@daisyui.com and I will help you get the right package.
There was an issue with the payment

If the payment failed and you didn't receive the product, it usually means the payment didn't go through. Please try again.
